message: Hello Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product for $12,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to acquire a valuable asset worth $15,000 to you at an attractive price.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  However, $12,000 is still a bit too high for me right now. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for the product.  Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While I understand your position, I would like to maintain a fair value for my product. I am proposing a price of $11,000 for the product. I believe this offers a reasonable compromise between our positions.
